item.title: Sarah add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "I am willing to see things differently. I am willing to see love." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "I am willing to witness my fears." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Worry is a prayer to chaos" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "I choose to reinterpret my fears with a more loving perspective. #MiraclesNow" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Miracle Message #16: “Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.” — Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. #MiraclesNow" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Whenever you notice your thoughts detour into attack mode, say out loud or to yourself: Happiness is a choice I make." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Miracle Message #22: I speak with confidence because the world needs my light. #MiraclesNow" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "I learned that real happiness doesn’t come from getting but from giving." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Much of our anxiety and stress comes when we’re focused on fear and disconnected from the voice of our inner guide." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "Heaven on Earth is a choice you must make, not a place you must find. —WAYNE DYER" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "your request is backed with the energy of love, it will be received with love. Step" -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "I’ve learned that fear is simply an illusion based on past experiences that we project into the present and onto the future." -- Gabrielle Bernstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gabrielle Bernstein
item.description: "When we fulfill our function, which is to truly love ourselves and share love with others, then true happiness sets in." -- Gabrielle Bernstein
